name: optimus prime

items.title: Streetwise
items.description: Knowledge of street culture and urban survival

items.title: Education
items.description: Formal education and knowledge of various subjects

items.title: Human Perception
items.description: Ability to read people and understand their motives

items.title: Hide/Evade
items.description: Ability to hide and evade detection

items.title: Fast Talk
items.description: Ability to talk quickly and convincingly

items.title: Resist Torture/Drugs
items.description: Ability to resist physical and psychological torture

equipment.name: Malorian Arms 3516
equipment.description: Custom .50 caliber handgun. 'The only gun that'll shoot through a tank'

equipment.name: Armored Rockerjacket
equipment.description: SP 10, looks like a classic rocker jacket

cyberware.name: Silverhand Cyberarm
cyberware.description: Chrome-plated cybernetic left arm with reinforced strength

cyberware.name: Subdermal Grip
cyberware.description: Palm-mounted grip implant for weapon stability

notes: Former frontman of SAMURAI. Lost left arm in 2023 Arasaka Tower raid. Hates corporations with a passion.
